name: Zodiac - Hellish Memory
description:
Challenge your ability, your reflexes and your memory to avoid from the bullets while defeat the zodiac spirits memorizing the cards and survive of a real bullet hell with difficulties for all playstyles.

Features:
  • Differentiated gameplay;
  • Difficulties for all playstyles
  • High re-playability;
  • 36 challenging stages;
  • Rank system;
